item.title: 562 yell troble help plz
item.dc:creator: @Alexman43 Alexman43
item.description:
@Alexman43 wrote:

Well i just got a 562 its awesome and well i do yell and the yell is like [Main Owner] Death L hey and i was wondering how to get the l out of the message i dont put it in and i tryed doing ::yel that just dosnt work and well can anyone help me?
this is the code i use

			if(cmd[0].equals("yell")) {
				String yellText = command.substring(5);
				for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
					if (p ==null) {
						continue;	
					}
			if(player.getRights() == 1) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=04B404>[Mod]<img=0>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
					if (player.getUsername().equals("Death")) {
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=00FF00>[Main Owner]<img=1>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));
						continue;
					}
                            if(player.donator == 1 && player.getRights() == 0) {
                                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=00FFFF>[Donater]<img=2>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
                            if(player.donator == 2 && player.getRights() == 0) {
                                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0174DF>[Super Donater]<img=2>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
                                            }
				}
			}

how do i fix plz help

~Death
